results.deck: Firefly Studios is a independent games developer in England, Scotland, and the United States. The company is largely known for the Stronghold franchise with over 5 million copies sold.
results.description: Founded in 1999, Firefly has expanded to have offices in both the U.K. and U.S. Before founding the company, Simon Bradbury and Eric Ouellette had played a part in the creation of other well-known series such as  Caesar and  Lords of the Realm for Sierra Online. In addition to the popular Stronghold real-time strategy titles, the company has also developed CivCity: Rome and Space Colony.
results.name: FireFly Studios Ltd.
